pad-read-not-found-error: Map with read-only ID {{padId}} could not be found.

database.object-not-found-in-pad-error: {{type}} {{id}} of map {{padId}} could not be found.
database.route-points-less-than-two-points-error: A line cannot have less than two route points.
database.unique-pad-ids-error: Read-only, read-write and admin ID have to be different from each other.
database.unique-pad-ids-read-write-error: Read-only and read-write ID cannot be the same.
database.unique-pad-ids-read-admin-error: Read-only and admin ID cannot be the same.
database.unique-pad-ids-write-admin-error: Read-write and admin ID cannot be the same.

routing.ors-token-warning: Warning: No ORS token configured. Please ask the administrator to set ORS_TOKEN in the environment or in config.env.
routing.too-much-distance-error: Too much distance between route points. Consider adding some via points.
routing.mapbox-token-warning: No Mapbox token configured. Please ask the administrator to set MAPBOX_TOKEN in the environment or in config.env.

socket.admin-revert-error: This kind of change can only be reverted in admin mode.

webserver.map-not-found-error: Map with ID {{padId}} could not be found.
